file_content.text: My lord, please halt before you proceed to the shuttle.
Excuse me, sir. Please halt before you proceed to the shuttle.
Excuse me, hunter. Please halt before you proceed to the shuttle.
Excuse me. Please halt before you proceed to the shuttle.
I am attache to Commander Calum of the Imperial Guard. He oversees all operations on Belsavis and requires your presence immediately.
Commander Calum and his order serve the Emperor himself, and thus, it is my privilege to be his servant.
He awaits you in his strategy room.
I meant no offense. I have delivered my message, and will depart.
Commander Calum is waiting for you.
